definition: frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Qi4 hou4 Bian4 hua4 Kuang4 jia4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 聯合國氣候變化框架公約

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反應型頁面渲染使用懶人框架結構。

sentences.english: This paper also discusses the framework of forecasting the induced passenger flow volume in URT.
sentences.chinese: 給出了城市軌道交通誘增交通量預測框架。

sentences.english: Under the reform banner, I would also include the social dimension.
sentences.chinese: 在改革的框架下，我也想談一談社會問題。

sentences.english: I'll just consider their theoretical arguments in broad strokes.
sentences.chinese: 我僅細想了他們大致框架裏的理論爭論。

sentences.english: It is proposed for the concealment of confidential information.
sentences.chinese: 基於相似性的搭載模型是實現信息隱蔽的一般框架。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the working principle and design calculation of the clamp frames for cement bonded particle board production.
sentences.chinese: 介紹水泥刨花板夾緊框架的工作原理和設計思路。

sentences.english: This framework lets the customer specify "actions" that the system should perform.
sentences.chinese: 這個框架讓客戶指定系統應該執行的“操作”。

sentences.english: Each method has a valid role in a generic testing framework.
sentences.chinese: 每個方法在一般測試框架中都有一個有效的角色。

sentences.english: Documents related to the regional anti-terrorism organization will have to be formulated within the framework of the Communiqué.
sentences.chinese: 有關地區反恐怖機構的文件要在公約的框架內製定。

sentences.english: A re-engineering framework of legacy system based on distributed environment of J2EE partition is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出基於J2EE分佈式環境的遺留系統再工程框架。

sentences.english: This is what I call the Meta-Frame.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我所說的元框架。

sentences.english: We’re removing all hardcoded paths from the framework.
sentences.chinese: 我們從框架中移除了所有的硬編碼的路徑。

sentences.english: It was an old-fashioned lift, operated by a lever on a brass box.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部老式的電梯，由一個黃銅框架上的槓桿操縱。

sentences.english: Surface panels applied to carcase or other structural frame.
sentences.chinese: 覆蓋在構架或其他框架上的面板。

sentences.english: We already had too many dif­ferent frameworks to try to meet.
sentences.chinese: 要知道我們已經有太多不同的框架需要去滿足了。

sentences.english: It dovetails with existing task oriented training to provide the framework for overall actions.
sentences.chinese: 能夠配合現有的培訓任務，爲面向行動的總體框架。

definition: to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to build (esp. with simple materials)/to knock together (a temporary shed)/to rig up
